ygData.subject: Re: EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves : was trading the stei n comments
ygData.msgSnippet: I think a lot of you people gushing about how easy it is to make money via loot are exaggerating.  I have a 23rd monk that works his butt off and he s never
ygData.messageBody:
I think a lot of you people gushing about how easy it is to make money via
loot are exaggerating. I have a 23rd monk that works his butt off and he's
never had more than about 125pp in the bank at any one time. I've spent time
in unrest. Where's the money there? FS weapons? The cash drops aren't
*that* great.

So if you have some advice for a player that is really tired of reading about
how others have more than 1,000pp in the bank, let 'er rip.

Aggrevated,

Yoyodyne on Fennin Ro



----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Kuenster (Entex) <v-ntxck@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 9:21 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves : was trading the stei n
comments


> From: "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...>
>
> Aye, its all relative. Plats are very easy to get even after level 20. I
> have never had less than 100 in the bank since then and almost always over
> 1000. Today I am buying Blk Pearl Plat earrings and will have up to 1000 to
> blow on failures and if they all fail the only thing thats a pain is getting
> 4 more BPs to play with. Replacing the 1000 is really easy. This is why I
> love the bazaars, I trade basically useless Plats for awesome items I or my
> friends can actually use, what a great concept.
>
